description: Configuration file for ESLint tailored to a Vue.js project using TypeScript, Vitest, and Prettier. It imports plugins and configurations, and exports a default configuration function that sets linting rules for specific files and directories.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Defines an ESLint configuration tailored for Vue + TypeScript projects, accepting configuration objects.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs.recommended
methods.description: Provides recommended ESLint configuration presets for Vue + TypeScript projects.
